llOpenLocalLink.message: Ouvrir le lien dans le contexte local
llOpenLocalLink.description: Title of the context menu submenu item for opening the link in a local context.

llOpenInThisTab.description: Title of the context menu item that opens the link in a local context in this tab.

llOpenInNewTab.description: Title of the context menu item that opens the link in a local context in a new tab.

llOpenInNewWindow.description: Title of the context menu item that opens the link in a local context in a new window.
